medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a history of left hip septic joint post-removal of the left femoral head and was recently discharged from the hospital after two months of treatment for endocarditis and hip surgery. The left hip pain is reported to be severe, and while hospitalized, she was very demanding and refused physical therapy unless she received more pain medication.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of substance abuse (intravenous 'speed'), endocarditis, left hip septic joint status post removal of the left femoral head.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died in a car wreck; father was an alcoholic imprisoned for money laundering. Patient and four brothers were placed in foster homes.
medical_history.social_history: Occupation as an exotic dancer and a 'madam'; history of drug abuse, particularly intravenous speed.
